org.smpp

Class Connection

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.smpp.SmppObject
      • org.smpp.Connection
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TCPIPConnection

    public abstract class Connection
extends SmppObject
    Abstract class defining necessary abstract methods for communication over socket based network communication interface. It defines methods for both client & server connection.
    Session, Transmitter and Receiver classes use this class for sending and receiving data to and from SMSC.
    Version:
    $Id: Connection.java 80 2009-10-28 02:13:18Z sverkera $
    Author:
    Logica Mobile Networks SMPP Open Source Team
    See Also:
    TCPIPConnection

    • Field Detail

      • address

        protected String address
        The address of the remote end of the connection.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Connection

        protected Connection()

    • Method Detail

      • open

        public abstract void open()
                   throws IOException
        This method should open the connection using communication parameters set up by constructor of the Connection object.
        Throws:
        IOException - Opening the connection can cause IOException in the derived classes.

      • close

        public abstract void close()
                    throws IOException
        This method should close the connection previously opened by the open() method.
        Throws:
        IOException - Closing the connection can cause IOException in the derived classes.

      • isOpened

        public abstract boolean isOpened()
        This method returns true if the connection is open.

      • send

        public abstract void send(ByteBuffer data)
                   throws IOException
        This method should send data over the connection. The timeout for sending is commsTimeout. If the data couldn't be sent, IOException should be thrown.
        Parameters:
        data - the data which have to be sent
        Throws:
        IOException - Sending a data over connection can cause IOException in the derived classes.

      • receive

        public abstract ByteBuffer receive()
                            throws IOException
        This method should receive data from the connection. The timeout for receiving is receiveTimeout. If no data are received within time specified by the timeout, null should be returned.
        Returns:
        the data received from the connection
        Throws:
        IOException - Receiving data over connection can cause IOException in the derived classes.

      • accept

        public abstract Connection accept()
                           throws IOException
        This method should wait for connection. If the connection is requested then this method should create new instance of connection and return it.
        Returns:
        the new accepted connection
        Throws:
        IOException - waiting for connection can cause an IOException

      • setCommsTimeout

        public void setCommsTimeout(long commsTimeout)
        Sets timeout used for calls to underlying communication functions for an instance of the derived Connection class.
        Parameters:
        commsTimeout - new communication timeout value

      • setReceiveTimeout

        public void setReceiveTimeout(long receiveTimeout)
        Sets timeout used for receiving data from connection using receive method for an instance of the derived Connection class.
        Parameters:
        receiveTimeout - new receive timeout value

      • setConnectionTimeout

        public void setConnectionTimeout(int connectionTimeout)
        Sets timeout used for create new connection to server for an instance of the derived Connection class.
        Parameters:
        connectionTimeout - new connection timeout value

      • getCommsTimeout

        public long getCommsTimeout()
        Returns currently set timeout used for calls to underlying communication functions for an instance of the derived Connection class.
        Returns:
        value of communication timeout

      • getReceiveTimeout

        public long getReceiveTimeout()
        Returns timeout used for receiving data from connection using receive method for an instance of the derived Connection class.
        Returns:
        value of timeout for receive

      • getConnectionTimeout

        public int getConnectionTimeout()
        Returns currently set timeout used for create new connection communication functions for an instance of the derived Connection class.
        Returns:
        value of connection timeout

      • getAddress

        public String getAddress()
